titles.draw_pacman_pivot: Add Sector Pivot with Directional Arc

tooltips.los_clear_at_critical_point: Line of sight clear at critical point (margin {diff}m)

success.new_session_started: New session started. Ready to load a KMZ or draw on the map.
success.kmz_loaded_select_tower: KMZ file processed. Select the initial antenna for simulation.
success.pacman_pivot_created: Sector pivot with arc "{name}" created successfully.
success.app_reset: Application reset. New session in progress.
success.tower_selected_for_simulation: Tower "{name}" selected. Run the simulation in the panel.
success.location_found: Location found and marked on the map.

errors.session_start_fail: Critical failure starting new session. Please reload the page.
errors.invalid_data_or_session: Invalid data or session not started. Please restart the application.
errors.no_coverage_to_search: No active coverage area. Activate the main antenna or a repeater.
errors.find_repeater_fail: Failed to search for repeater sites: {error}
errors.session_not_started_for_draw: Session not started. Restart before drawing.
errors.session_not_started: Session not started. Load a KMZ or restart the application.
errors.nothing_to_export: No eligible data for export. Run a simulation first.
errors.los_diagnostic_fail: Line of sight diagnosis failed for target {name}.
errors.los_source_must_have_signal: SOURCE: select a target (pivot or irripump) WITH signal.
errors.invalid_coordinate_format: Invalid coordinate format. Use DMS (e.g., 19¬∞26'S 44¬∞29'W) or Decimal (e.g., -19.44 -44.49).
errors.draw_pivot_radius_too_small: Radius too small. Drawing cancelled. Click for a new center.
errors.template_load_fail: Failed to fetch templates. Check your connection.

info.no_towers_found: No antennas found in the KMZ. Add manually by clicking on the map.
info.los_mode_on: 'Repeater Site Analysis' mode activated. Select a pivot without coverage.
info.target_pivot_selected: Target pivot selected: {name}. Searching for sites...
info.no_promising_sites_found: No promising sites found with the current criteria.
info.draw_pivot_step1: Geographic Edit Mode: click to set the pivot's center.
info.draw_pivot_step2: Center defined. Click again to set the radius.
info.draw_pivot_still_active: Edit Mode still active. Click for a new pivot.
info.analyzing_targets_from_source: Analyzing line of sight for {count} targets from "{source}"...
info.no_uncovered_targets_in_radius: No uncovered targets within the {limit} radius.
info.edit_mode_activated: Edit mode activated: drag pins or right-click to remove.
info.positions_updated_resimulate: Positions updated. Rerun the simulation to see the impact.
info.los_mode_step1_source: PIVOT-TO-PIVOT DIAGNOSIS: select the SOURCE target (with signal).
info.los_source_selected: SOURCE: {name} selected. Now select the DESTINATION (without signal).
info.los_source_already_selected: SOURCE: {name} is already the source. Select the DESTINATION.
info.los_source_changed: SOURCE changed to: {name}. Select the DESTINATION.
info.los_result_clear_critical: Line of sight {source} ‚Üí {target} (Dist: {distance}) ‚úÖ Clear at critical point.
info.los_new_source_prompt: Select a new SOURCE (with signal) or deactivate the mode.
info.draw_sector_pivot_step1: Sector Edit Mode: click to set the center.
info.draw_sector_pivot_step2: Center defined. Adjust radius/direction and click to finish.
info.draw_sector_pivot_still_active: Sector Mode still active. Click for a new pivot.
info.draw_pacman_step1: Sector Edit Mode with Arc: click to set the center.
info.draw_pacman_step2: Center defined. Click for radius and initial angle.
info.draw_pacman_step3: Radius and initial angle defined. Click for final angle.
info.draw_pacman_still_active: Arc Mode still active. Click for a new pivot.
info.draw_irripump_step1: Add Irripump Mode: click to insert.
info.draw_irripump_still_active: Irripump Mode still active. Click for another one.
info.find_repeater_long_process_warning: The search for repeater sites may take a minute or more. Please wait.

confirm.remove_pivot: Confirm deletion of pivot "{name}" and its associated areas?
confirm.change_los_source: SOURCE is already {sourceName}. Change to {newName}? Diagnostic lines will be removed.
